title: I'VE BEEN ROBBED
description: I don't often get robbed by Billion dollar corporations... but when I do, I win. Grab an X-RAY skin for your device HERE:  and help us fight the unprincipled behemoth that is Casetify.  Get my JerryRig Razor knife HERE:   Follow me for updates!  Instagram:   Facebook:   Twitter:    Looking for a Casetify Review? Maybe look at this first.
transcript: I've got something a little bit different for you today. A video I never thought I'd have to make. There's a company, a company you've all heard of, and a company worth probably close to a billion dollars that's stealing my stuff.
